TopicTitle: 99 Bottles of Beer on the Wall: Second Round

Articles.Content:
54 cards are on the casino table
54 cards together with jokers.

Bet.
Take one down.
Take one down.
Take one down.
Raise.
Drop one.
Take one down.
Game.

Again 54 cards on the table.

53 bottles of beer on the wall

53 bottles of beer

Knock one down

It shatters on ground

52 bottles of beer on the wall.

(The thread title gets misleading every time.

Would please the OP update the thread title on every counter change?)

No.

 

52 bottles of beer on the wall,

52 bottles of beer,

Take one down, pass it around,

51 bottles of beer on the wall.

HA!

 

51 bottles of suds on the sill

51 bottles of suds

Take one down, pass it around..

Half a century bottles of suds on the sill.

fünfzig Flaschen Bier an der Wand,

fünfzig Flaschen Bier,

Nimm einen runter, gib ihn herum,

Neunundvierzig Flaschen Bier an der Wand.

Spoiler

fifty (50) bottles of beer on the wall,

fifty (50) bottles of beer,

Take one down, pass it around,

forty-nine (49) bottles of beer on the wall.

English translation in spoiler box to please our moderator overlords. German is a fun language.

Squared seven bottles of root beer on the wall.
Squared seven bottles of root beer.
Take one down, take the root (7).
(7-1)(7+1)=48 bottles on the wal..

48 bottles of glorified grape juice stuck to the inside of a house, 

48 bottles of glorified grape juice,
Take one off the aforementioned inside of house,

Share it with a group of 10-20 people,

47 bottles of glorified grape juice stuck to the inside of a house!

47 bottles of antimatter on the wall,
47 bottles of antimatter,
Take one down, it blows up the wall (antimatter explodes when reacted with matter),
46 bottles of antimatter on the wall

46 bottles of beer on the wall,
46 bottles of beer,
Take one down, pass it around,
45 bottles of beer on the wall.

42+3 bottles of alcoholic cereal juice on the wall
42+3 bottles of alcoholic cereal juice...

Take one down,
Pass it around,

42+2 bottles of alcoholic cereal juice on the wall.

Twin four bottles of fluid on the wall.
Twin four bottles of fluid.

Take single down,
Then give it a pair.

Fourty two bottles of fluid on the wall.

Edited July 15, 2021 by kerbiloid

42 bottles of beer on the wall

42 bottles of beer

take one down throw it at a passing train

41 bottles of beer on the wall

Fourty one bottle of tea on the wall
For tea one bottle of tea.

Take one down
When it's five o'clock.

For tea bottles of tea on the wall.

On 3/24/2020 at 9:46 PM, RoninFrog said:

40 bottles of beer on the wall,
40 bottles of beer,
Take one down, pass it around,
39 bottles of beer on the wall

Too lazy to write my own

39 boxes of tea on the wall

39 boxes of tea

take one down, throw it into Boston harbour

38 boxes of tea on the wall

38 sectors of color on the wheel
38 sectors of color

Choose one sector,
Bet a coin

37 left in the wallet.

37 bottles of beer on the wall,
37 bottles of beer,
Take one down, pass it around,
36 bottles of beer on the wall.

36 cards are in the Russian deck,
36 cards on the table.

From six to the ace,
Take one out of the deck.

35 cards on the table.

35 kerbals in the ship, 35 kerbals in the ship.

Take one on Eva, And screw it out of control.

34 kerbals in the ship.

Edited July 22, 2021 by Som-Boi_lol

34 bottles of beer on the wall

34 bottles of beer!

take one down

EAT THE GLASS

33 bottles of beer on the wall!

33 degrees in the masonic Lounge
33 degrees in the Lounge

Take one up...
(Touch the left ear with your right index finger.
Shake your head four times from right to another right.
Make two steps to the right, turn back, one more step  with face backwards.
Draw the phrase "COMBO AKIMBO" with finger in air.
Show you golden Discombobulator of Apprentice sigil.
Repeat).

32 steps left for you.

33 bottles of beer on the wall,
33 bottles of beer,
Take one down, pass it around,
32 bottles of beer on the wall

32 Containers of Goo on the wall

32 Containers of Goo

Take one down, Report it around

31 Containers of Goo on the wall

31 bottles of beer on the wall

31 bottles of beer

Take one down

INSERT THE BOTTLE DOWN YOUR NOSTRIL

30 bottles of beer on the wall
